testcase.name: BaccaratCard objects can be compared & ordered
Cards dealt correctly from unshuffled Shoe

failure.message: org.gradle.internal.exceptions.DefaultMultiCauseException: Multiple Failures (3 failures) java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: <1\u2663> but: was <Q\u2663> java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: <2\u2663> but: was <1\u2663> java.lang.AssertionError: Expected: <3\u2663> but: was <K\u2660>

testcase.name: CardException when creating a Shoe with wrong number of decks
CardException when dealing from empty shoe
Shoes are created with the correct numbers of cards
BaccaratHand has the correct string representation

testcase.name: BaccaratCard objects can be tested for equality
Correct detection of whether a BaccaratHand is a 'natural'
